executable.title: Trim Foreground In Direction (BRAINS)
executable.description: This program will trim off the neck and also air-filling noise from the inputImage.

image.name: inputVolume
image.label: Input Image Volume
image.description: Input image to trim off the neck (and also air-filling noise.)

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output Image Volume
image.description: Output image with neck and air-filling noise trimmed isotropic image with AC at center of image.

integer.name: directionCode
integer.label: directionCode
integer.description: This flag chooses which dimension to compare. The sign lets you flip direction.

double.name: otsuPercentileThreshold
double.label: otsuPercentileThreshold
double.description: This is a parameter to FindLargestForegroundFilledMask, which is employed to trim off air-filling noise.

integer.name: closingSize
integer.label: closingSize
integer.description: This is a parameter to FindLargestForegroundFilledMask

double.name: headSizeLimit
double.label: headSizeLimit
double.description: Use this to vary from the command line our search for how much upper tissue is head for the center-of-mass calculation. Units are CCs, not cubic millimeters.

string.name: backgroundFillValueString
string.description: Fill the background of image with specified short int value. Enter number or use BIGNEG for a large negative number.
string.label: Background Fill Value

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
